Hi -

We are beginning to look at implementing duplicate reduction in our
c=
rawling. I am trying to get my head around the various features
available f=
or Heritrix.

I know of Kristinn Sigur=C3=B0sson=E2=80=99s work on a dedupl=
icator [1]. There is
also the work with the PersistLogProcessor/FetchHistor=
yProcessor [2].
There is also planned work with =E2=80=98continuous=E2=80=
=99 crawling for Heritrix
2.2.x and beyond.

A few questions that I was hop=
ing others might be able to help me
with:

Has anybody done any comparison =
of these features?

Are there any duplicate reduction systems that I am mis=
sing?

And, finally, are there any immediate plans to have these systems
be=
gin working with the WARC format?

Thanks for any help anybody can give me =
here.

best,
Erik Hetzner

1. <http://deduplicator.sourceforge.net/>
2. <ht=
tp://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix/Feature+Notes+-+1.12.0=
>
